"My Set":
"My Set is a system that lets you save your current Class combination and equipment as a set, which you can easily switch to at a later time.

You can register My Sets and switch between them at the Class Counter."

"If any registered equipment is not present in your Inventory, it will be moved there from your Storage.

If your Inventory is full, some equipment may not be changed."

"You can also link a My Set and a My Fashion together with the \"Link with My Fashion\" function.

Once a My Fashion and a My Set are linked, switching to that My Set will also switch to that My Fashion."
